name: WSJ
text: Rachel Krupa recently completed an audit of her stock. She was surprised to find that of the 200 brands on her shelves, just three were Black-owned. She since has expanded that selection to 20. https://t.co/kRWqp1cYUW

text: For a disabled actor in Hollywood, the challenges are more than just getting the rare gig: roughly one-third of disabled actors reported facing discrimination in the workplace, according to one report https://t.co/flFrlCuM3b
